author: chanderprakash20
content: <@686695036733227017> Hi, I decided to conclude that I will do my project as an open-source researcher contributor but still read the EPF wiki and other resources when I have time to join the EPF  meeting to upgrade my knowledge. Now, I am focusing on my experiences of core research by which I can contribute better to Ethereum. Thanks for your guidance and feedback, but I am not participating and contributing to Ethereum through EPF, and I find it not for the researcher.
